attributes.background: We have to learn at least 210 quotes plus context. This is ridiculous!

rejection.details:
We're not sure if you'd like GCSE English Literature to be completely abolished as a subject, or if you'd like the exams to be "open book" rather than "closed book", so that people don't have to learn quotations.

If you'd like open book exams, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200299

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
